EmailTemplate.subject: Unlock Higher Profits with new Analytics from Honeywell GoDirect™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
More insights. More profitability. One URL. Next time you login into GoDirect™ you will notice some new applications as part of your dashboard. Coming soon you will have an opportunity to access more analytics for connected maintenance, flight efficiency and predictive trend monitoring and diagnostics all from your platform.
One login. One analytics platform. One goal…
To help you take advantage of more insights that boost your profits, create higher aircraft availability and deliver better on-time performance today!
How do I Start?
Simply follow the "Get Started" <[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com]]> below and sign in with your Honeywell username and password.
Also coming soon is an online seminar series to help you leverage the analytics in your platform to unlock higher profitability. CLICK HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_01_Global_Email_GoDirectSPoG_Cathay_TM_2019_01_Global_LandingPage_GoDirectSPoG_TM.html]]> to get registered today.
Are you ready to take profitability to the next level?
GET STARTED <[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com]]>
